places_with_reviews.address: FJJ8+97P, Rohri Rd, Maheshkhunt, Banni, Bihar 851214, India

reviews.text: Very nice place for worship and it has a big ground
Old and famous Durga mandir surrounded by small shop mostly sweet, kirana & vegetable .
This is very beautiful goddess durga's temple and it is very nice and I love it very much.

places_with_reviews.name: Ramchandrapur Durga Mandir

reviews.text:
One of the oldest devi durga temple of maheshkhunt thats located in ramchandrapur village.
At the time of morning puja during Navratri or Navami, You'll find this place very much cool as this place is crowd free.

This temple is built by the contribution of ramchandarpur villagers, they don't take donation to build temple from people outside of village.
Very good village and Durga mandir

places_with_reviews.name: शिव मंदिर, नया नगर बन्नी,खगड़िया

reviews.text:
Shiv mandir commonly called shivalaya in naya nagar banni.  the Shiv parvthi temple remains an active site of worship and doesn't need any ticket.
As you can see the attached picture, it has half feet height Lingam and as per Pujari Ji ,same height of half part is below the visible base.

There used to be an evening Aarti just below the temple which is best part.

Dont expect same level of architecture as other temples in western group of temple has.
